thread.title: Local women's team to play in tennis national championships
thread.title_full: Local women's team to play in tennis national championships

title: Local women's team to play in tennis national championships
text: Local women's team to play in tennis national championships Comment Posted Oct. 19, 2015 at 8:12 AM Updated Oct 19, 2015 at 8:44 AM Posted Oct. 19, 2015 at 8:12 AM Updated Oct 19, 2015 at 8:44 AM » Social News The USTA Women’s 55 plus 6.0 tennis team from Split Rock will compete in the national championships Friday through Sunday in Surprise, Arizona, after recently winning its sectional. The team advanced by taking the title at the USTA Middle States Sectional Championships Sept. 18-20 in Lancaster. Team members shown in the photo are: Cecilia Yost, Anita Scarperia, Debbie Driebe(Co-captain), Dawn Simm, Celinda Christensen, Ellie Buff, Catherine Pepe, Jackie Olsen, Carolyn Pace, Ginny Steckel and coach Gene Tapiro. Missing from photo: Nancy Casale (captain), Karen Griffin, Lisa Klaire, and Paula Kodnovich. poconorecord.com Posted Oct. 19, 2015 at 8:12 AM Updated Oct 19, 2015 at 8:44 AM
